name: Demo: After the Storm Chapter 2
description:
Gameplay: Mouse (left mouse click to continue dialogue and select)

The first chapter followed Eliana through her post-storm cleanup routine, but now it is Yera's turn. She does not care about the damage or even the preparations for the fair the next day... she is focused on trying to fill her basic needs and survive after she has lost her home to another one of the suspicious catastrophies that have been happening lately...
